name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Lamont BLAGMAN

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

719 A.2d 310
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Lamont BLAGMAN.

Catherine Marshall, Hugh J. Burns, Jr., Philadelphia, for Com.

Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
